resources.string: Tap the \"Back\" button again to exit the app
There was an error loading the list of servers. Please try again
There was an error creating the server settings. Please try again
There was an error updating the server settings. Please try again
There was an error deleting the server settings. Please try again
There was an error recording the audio. Please try again
If you delete this server, all draft and submitted forms will be deleted from your device. Delete anyway?
There was an error submitting the form. Please try again
There was an error submitting the form: %s
There were validation errors in some answers
In order to make your files verifiable, Tella needs to record your location and needs permission to access your GPS.
There was an error updating the list of forms. Please try again
There was an error displaying this form. Please try again
Are you sure you want to delete this form from your device? Note that because it was already submitted, the data will remain on your organization\'s server.
Are you sure you want to delete this draft form?
Keep Tella in the same language as my device
You do not have permission to submit this form. If you think this is a mistake, please contact your organization
There was an error importing the file. Please try again
You’re not connected to the internet. Try again when connected
Parts or all of the form wasn\'t sent. Are you sure you want to discard it?
There was an error exporting the files. Please try again
In order to export files, Tella needs permission to write on the device\'s storage.
There was an error deleting the files. Please try again.
The selected file will be permanently deleted from your gallery.
This will make your file accessible from outside Tella, in your device\'s gallery and by other apps.
There was an error opening the gallery to import the files. Please try again
There was an error saving the file. Please try again
There was an error attaching the file. Please try again
There was an error downloading the form. Please try again
There was an error downloading the form: %s
The form could not be found. It may have been deleted from your organization\'s server
This is not a valid URL.
The username or password is incorrect.
There was an error trying to connect to the server.
You’re not connected to the internet. Try again when connected.
Select a custom icon and name to better hide Tella on your device. Note that the Tella icon will remain visible from the Android settings.
Makes your media files verifiable by collecting information about your device and location.
To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a compatible server. Ask your organization for the server information and set up the server here.
There are no submitted forms to display.
There are no forms to display. Tap the refresh button to check if there are forms available on the servers you\'re connected to.
Select a different name and logo
There are no files to show. Tap the + button to import files.
You’re not connected to the internet. Try again when connected
Crash reports help us improve Tella. They are automatically sent and include data such as device model and Android version.
You will be able to answer all the questions in \"%s\" again.
You will be able to answer all the questions in \"%s\".
There was an error loading the attachment. Please try again
Touch anywhere for 3 seconds to record position.
There was an error saving the signature. Please try again
There was an error loading the form. Please try again
Your internet connection is too weak to send the form. Please try again
All forms and servers have been deleted
To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a server. Ask your organization for the server information and set up the server.
If you would like to create your own forms, contact us or use any service based on the Open Data Kit (ODK)
If you are not connected to the Internet, you can still fill forms. The data will be submitted as soon as you get online.
Your form cannot be submitted because the attachments are too large. Please attach smaller files
If you exit now, the submission will be stopped but you will be able to submit the remaining files later.
Unchecked items will be saved for later sending.
Verification mode is ON but GPS is OFF. Turn ON GPS in order to record the position of your evidence.
Do you want to include verification information?
One or several selected files contain verification data, including device, network and geolocation information. Only share if this will not put you at risk.
Tella is recording information to make your file verifiable. It can take several minutes. Make sure your device\'s view of the sky is unobstructed for better results.
Where the file was located in the Tella directory.
A unique number to identify the file.
The date and time the file was last modified on the device.
The name of the device manufacturer.
The exact model of the device.
A unique number identifying the Android device.
The exact screen size of the device.
The language the device\'s operating system is set to.
The geographic region the device is set to.
Whether the device is connected or disconnected to the internet.
If the device is connected to the internet, specifies whether it is to a Wi-Fi network or to a cellular network.
A unique identifier to the device\'s Wi-Fi connector.
A unique address identifying the device\'s internet connection.
A more recent identifier to a device\'s internet connection.
The exact location of the device, includes latitude and longitude coordinates, altitude in meters, the accuracy of the measurement in meters, and the time of the measurement.
How location is determined. \"Fused\" means it\'s using a mix of methods, including GPS and network connections.
The speed at which the device is traveling in meters per second.
The identifying numbers of all the cell towers the device is connected to.
The name of all Wi-Fi networks in the vicinity of the device.
Some forms have been updated. Tap the update button next to the forms to get the latest version.
Which server would you like to upload the files to?
Select the type of server you want to connect to. If you are unsure, ask your organization.
Higher resolution means that the video will be of higher quality but the file size will also be larger.
Tella will upload your photos, videos, or audio recordings to the server as soon as they are recorded or imported into Tella.
Which server would you like to auto-upload the files to?
How would you like to lock Tella?
Turn off the camera shutter sound to draw less attention when taking photos.
Shows a sliding button on the homescreen to quickly exit Tella in emergency situations.
Connect to servers to collect and send data to your organization
Upload your files to your Reports server as soon as they are captured (photos, videos, or audio recordings) or imported into Tella.
If activated, Tella will automatically delete the files uploaded as soon as the upload is complete.
Your photos, videos, and audio files will be automatically uploaded as soon as they are recorded, and any file will be automatically uploaded when you import it into Tella.
Your files will no longer be automatically uploaded to the server.
Your files will no longer be automatically deleted once the upload is complete.
Decide how long it takes for Tella to lock
Delete all the files stored in Tella.
Delete all draft and submitted forms.
Delete your connections to servers and all forms associated with them.
Delete the app and all the data it contains. You will be asked “Do you want to uninstall this app?” Unless you confirm, Tella will not be deleted.
Overcome attempts to block Tella in your region. Note that enabling this will make it slower to send data to the servers.
Your app is currently camouflaged with a Calculator app
Select your preferred method of hiding Tella
There are two camouflage options available. The first one is quicker but less secure; the second one is less convenient but more secure.
Tella will appear on the home screen with a different app name and icon
The most secure option: Camouflage Tella behind an actual functioning app
Less secure: Tella will appear on the home screen with a different app name and icon. Tapping on the new icon opens the actual Tella.
More secure: Camouflage Tella behind an actual functioning calculator app. Input your PIN on the calculator to unlock Tella.
The Calculator camouflage is only possible if you use a PIN lock. Change lock here
If you change your lock method, Camouflage will be disabled
The audio recording was saved to your Tella files
Take photos and videos directly in Tella. These files are automatically encrypted and saved in Tella, and will not be visible from your phone’s regular gallery.
Record interviews or any sound around you with Tella’s voice recorder. The audio files are automatically encrypted and saved in Tella’s hidden folder.
Securely store and organize all your files. As long as Tella is locked, your files and folders will remain inaccessible to someone seizing or searching the device.
Your lock is set up! You can change it anytime in Settings.
You can go to Tella now, or continue customizing Tella to set up advanced settings.
If you work with an organization, connect to the organization’s server to send files and data with them. Your organization should provide you with the server details.
Continue without connecting to a server
To make it harder to find on your device, you can hide Tella by changing the way it looks on your homescreen.
Tella remains visible on the home screen
You can always continue changing your preferences in Settings.
You have successfully connected Tella to the server and will be able to share your data.
Your camouflage is set up! You can change it anytime in Settings.
The Calculator camouflage is only possible if you use a PIN lock.
Tella will be hidden behind a functional Calculator app. Unlock Tella by entering your PIN on the calculator followed by =
Show previews of and a shortcut to your recent files on Tella’s homescreen.
Show shortcuts to your favorite forms on Tella’s homescreen.
To re-open Tella, look for the %s app icon among your apps.
To re-open Tella, look for the Calculator app icon among your apps. Unlock Tella by entering your PIN in the Calculator followed by “=”.
Give your server a name to recognize it if you add more servers later. It could be the organization’s name, the project’s name, etc.
Your recording is not saved. Would you like to save it before exiting?
If you cancel, your file will be lost
Change lock method and remove camouflage?
Your current Calculator camouflage is only compatible with a PIN lock. If you change your lock method, Tella will no longer be camouflaged and will be visible on your phone’s homescreen.
Enter your password to change your camouflage method
Are you sure you want to remove this template?
This Uwazi collection is available in several languages. Please select the language in which you would like to download templates.
Show shortcuts to your favorite templates on Tella’s homescreen.
Your have no saved templates. Tap the “+” button to add a new template.
Your Outbox is currently empty. Entities that are ready to send will appear here.
Are you sure you want to remove this draft?
This is not a valid Url
You must fill in the mandatory fields
You must fill in the title
The second date in the range must be after the first
Select as many files as you wish
Attach a video or audio file
Choose how you want to add files
Attach as many PDF files as you wish
Choose how you want to add PDF files

These are entities you have not submitted.
Tap on an entity to continue working on it.
These are entities ready to send or partially sent.
These are entities that you have submitted.
Choose how you want to add files
Are you sure you want to remove \"%1$s\"?
These are the templates available on the Uwazi instances you are connected to.
These are Uwazi templates you can fill out.
Log in if you have a username and password, or use the server\'s public access.
This Uwazi instance requires two-step verification. Enter here the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
The verification code is Invalid or expired. Please try again.
You have successfully connected to the server and will be able to share your data.
Log in to access the server
The selected file will be permanently deleted from Tella.
Uncheck attachments to send them later. You can complete the submission from your Outbox.
Exiting will stop the submission of your form. You will be able to resume the submission later from your Outbox.
Your form submission has been stopped. You can resume it from the Outbox.
Please wait. You will return to your device\'s home screen in a few seconds.
Are you sure you want to delete this draft?
Are you sure you want to delete this form?
Block screenshots and screen recordings inside Tella and screen preview in the list of recent apps
If you are not sure, please ask your organization.
To perform this action, Tella will remain unlocked for 3 minutes.
How would you like to set up Tella?
Explore and fully customize the app
Set the lock and get started immediately
I have a code from my organization
Your organization may provide a code for you to set up Tella according to their settings.
There was an error locating the file\'s verification information. Please try again
There was an error locating the file to upload. Please try again
In order to record audio, Tella needs permission to access your microphone.
Tap anywhere to open the camera
The file was added to your gallery
In order to capture photo, video, and audio files, Tella needs access to your camera and microphone.
In order to take photos and videos, Tella needs permission to access your camera.
Manage your connection to servers to send data.
Would you like to delete your server connections altogether, or simply hide them? Hiding will keep server information in memory so that you can easily reconnect and submit data to the servers.
If you delete this server, your files will no longer be auto-uploaded.
Tella will automatically delete the files from your device as soon as they are uploaded to the server.
You will no longer be able to upload files to this server.
You have signed up to share your data.
We upgraded some of Tella libraries and we\'d need to re-download all forms.
Please wait while we update Forms.
Do you have a username and password?
Log in to access the project
You can always change your Reports preferences in the Tella Settings.
Include information about your device and location when sending reports, to make your files verifiable.
Continue uploading reports while doing other tasks or if you exit Tella. WARNING: If enabled, Tella will remain unlocked until all reports are fully uploaded.
You can always change your Reports preferences in the Tella Settings.
Your Drafts is currently empty. Reports that you have not submitted will appear here.
Your Outbox is currently empty. Reports that are ready to be sent will appear here.
The report was saved as a draft
Are you sure you want to delete this report?
Are you sure you want to delete this sent report from your records?
You are already connected to this project. Please enter another URL.
The report was saved to your Outbox. You can submit it when you are ready.
Auto-report cannot be enabled on more than one connection. Disable auto-report elsewhere to enable it here.
Whenever you take a photo/video/audio recording in Tella, a report will automatically be created with the file and uploaded to this project.
Automatically delete files from your device once they are uploaded to this project as a report.
To submit a report, please type in a title and either add a description or attach a file.
Retain EXIF metadata when importing photos and videos into Tella. This includes data about when the image was created, camera settings, location and your device.
On the unlock screen, show the remaining number of failed unlocking attempts before everything inside Tella is deleted
Decide how many failed unlock attempts are allowed before everything inside Tella is deleted.
On the unlock screen, show the remaining number of failed unlocking attempts before everything inside Tella is deleted
Your Tella data will be deleted after %1$d failed unlock attempts
This feature is not available with the calculator camouflage. Change your camouflage to enable this feature.
The file(s) you imported have been automatically uploaded as a report.
The photo(s)/video you took has been automatically uploaded as a report.
The recording you made has been automatically uploaded as a report.
The file(s) you imported have been uploaded as a report and automatically deleted.
"The photo/video you took has been uploaded as a report and automatically deleted."
"The recording you made has been uploaded as a report and automatically deleted."
Your report is available in the Outbox
To submit a report, please select a project, type in a title and either add a description or attach a file.
Your changes have not been saved. Would you like to save before exiting?
You have 1 attempt remaining until everything in your Tella is deleted.
You have %1$d attempts remaining until everything in your Tella is deleted.
You have exceeded the maximum number of incorrect login attempts. All your Tella data has been deleted.
Align longer sections of text to the left and right margins for a neater look. If disabled, text will be left- or right-aligned to increase accessibility.
Increase line spacing to 150% and paragraph spacing to 225%.
You will return to the previous screen in a few seconds.
WARNING: using this feature may reveal to someone observing the network that you use Tella. Only use if you feel comfortable with this risk.

Tell us if you are experiencing a bug, have a request for a new feature, or have any other feedback. This feedback is anonymous, so make sure to include contact information if you want a response from us.
You can come back anytime to submit your feedback.
You are not connected to the internet. Your feedback will be sent automatically when you are connected.
Your Outbox is currently empty. Forms that are ready to send will appear here.
These are empty forms you can fill out.
These are the activities currently ongoing in the background.
There are currently no ongoing activities in the background.
There are files being encrypted in the background. Do you want to exit and lose the files?
There are files being encrypted in the background. Do you want to exit and lose the files?
You have not downloaded any resources. Tap on the “download” icon next to each resource below to get started.
You have not downloaded any resources.
These are the resources available for download from your Tella Web project(s).
There are no resources available for download from your Tella Web project(s).
\"%s\" has been removed from your downloads.
Your download progress will be lost. You can always come back later to download the resource again.
Tella is still recording information about your device and location. If you exit, your file will not be verifiable.

The next version of Tella (to be released on 15 July 2024) will include major technical improvements. These changes carry a small risk that some files are lost when updating to the new version.
If you store sensitive files in Tella, we advise you to copy them to a safe place outside of Tella before the update.
Tap ‘Learn More’ below for more information on the upcoming changes and guidance on how to export all files from Tella.
Select the entities you want to connect to this property.
Reminder: You are currently sharing your app’s analytics to improve Tella. Stop sharing anytime by going to Settings.
For more information on how we collect data,
You can opt out anytime by going to Settings.
For more information on how we collect data, visit this page.
• We use DivviUp, a privacy-respecting system for analytics. • We collect as little data as possible. • All data is anonymous and can never be linked to you.
Each study collects data about specific questions. Here’s a sample:
🔓 Opened Tella 4 times a week 💾 32 files stored in Tella 📖 Spanish language selected ⚡ 1 server connected 😎 Calculator camouflage enabled
Share your data to improve Tella
By joining this study, you would help us understand which features are important to you and how you use the app.
• We will not access any of the files that you store in Tella or share with your organization. • We will never share your data or sell it to anyone.

Help us understand how you use Tella. All data is anonymous and can never be linked to you.
Would you like to share analytics with the Tella team?
Help us understand how you use Tella. Your data can never be linked to you.
Search for or select the entities you want to connect to this property.
You have signed up to share analytics. You can always change this in Settings.
You will not longer be sharing analytics. You can always change this in Settings.

The database migration failed. If you have a backup of your files, please reinstall Tella and re-import your files into Tella. If you don\'t have a backup and you lost your files, do not delete Tella and contact us: contact@tella-app.org
If you work with an organization, send forms, reports, and files directly from Tella to your organization.
Learn more about the types of drives.
You can either connect to an organizational Shared Drive or create a new folder in your personal Drive.
Select a Drive to connect to
What type of server would you like to connect to?
For the following categories, only one connection can be enabled at a time. To add a new connection, please delete the current one by going to Connections Settings.
You do not have permission to upload to this folder.
If you work with an organization, connect to its server to send files and data. Your organization should provide you with the server details.
These are reports you are working on.
These reports are ready to be submitted
These are reports that you have successfully submitted.
Learn more about connections here. If you work with an organization, you can ask them about which connection to use.
Your reports will be uploaded to a new folder on your Nextcloud. Choose a name for this folder here.
Error connecting to server. Please try again.
- The server certificate is not trusted
- The server certificate valid dates are in the future
- The URL does not match the hostname in the certificate
Do you want to trust this certificate anyway?
This digest algorithm is not available on your phone.
There is a problem loading the certificate.
The certificate could not be shown.
The identity of the server could not be verified
Your reports will be uploaded to a new folder on your Google Drive. Choose a name for this folder here.
File name taken. Please use a different one.
Folder name is already taken. Please use a different one.
For the moment, only files smaller than 20MB can be submitted to the Nextcloud server.
Your report have successfully been submitted.
Show this QR code for the sender to scan
Having trouble with the QR code?
The sender needs to input the following to\n connect to your device.
Make sure that this sequence matches what is shown on the sender’s device.
If the sequence on your device does not match the sequence on the sender’s device, the connection may not be secure and should be discarded.
Make sure both devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi network

Tips to connect
1. The Wi-Fi network does not need to be 
connected to the internet.
2. You can create your own Wi-Fi network
 using your phone’s hotspot feature.
 3. Disable any VPN connections.
Yes, we are on the same Wi-Fi network
Share files with nearby devices without an Internet connection\n 1. Both devices must be connected to the same Wifi network\n 2. Make sure you trust the person you are sharing files with
